name: rx-extra
description: rx-extra extends the RxJS 5 library with extra methods like fromNodeReadableStream and splitOnChange

scripts.clean:es5: rm -rf main.js main.d.ts observable operator add
scripts.compile-old:es5: npm run clean:es5 && tsc --project tsconfig.json --module commonjs --types 'node,lodash' --target es5 && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.compile:es5: npm run clean:es5 && tsc --project tsconfig.json --outDir ./ && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.compile-old:esnext: npm run clean:esnext && tsc --project tsconfig.json --module es2015 --types 'node,lodash' --target es6 --outDir esnext && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.compile:esnext: npm run clean:esnext && tsc --project tsconfig.esnext.json && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: mocha test/spec/api.js --reporter min --colors && echo ok || echo not ok

author: Anders Riutta
